statements: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, email, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' AND department <> 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, phone_number FROM employees WHERE department IN ('Sales', 'Marketing') ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2020-01-01' AND (department = 'Finance' OR department = 'IT') ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, email FROM employees WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND department LIKE '%Sales%' ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, business_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'Finance' AND employee_id > 100;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, business_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE employee_id < 50;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, business_interest FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE business_interest IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE business_interest LIKE '%tech%';
SELECT c.employee_name, r.relationship_type FROM conflicts_of_interest c INNER JOIN relationship r ON c.employee_id = r.employee1_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT interest_name, description FROM business_interests ORDER BY interest_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, interest_id, description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE resolution='Resolved';

SELECT e.full_name, b.interest_name, c.description FROM employees e JOIN relationships r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id JOIN business_interests b ON r.interest_id = b.interest_id JOIN conflicts_of_interest c ON r.interest_id = c.interest_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Sales' AND position='Manager';
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT e.full_name, r.relation_id, b.interest_name FROM employees e JOIN relationships r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id JOIN business_interests b ON r.interest_id = b.interest_id WHERE b.category='Technology';
SELECT e.full_name, c.description AS conflict_description, c.resolution AS conflict_resolution FROM employees e JOIN conflicts_of_interest c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.conflict_id=3;

SELECT e.full_name, e.position, COUNT(r.relation_id) AS num_relations FROM employees e LEFT JOIN relationships r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name, e.position HAVING num_relations > 1 ORDER BY num_relations DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM business_interests WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, count(*) as num_conflicts FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_conflicts > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, b.interest_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN conflicts_of_interest c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id INNER JOIN business_interests b ON c.interest_id = b.interest_id WHERE c.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, COUNT(c.conflict_id) AS conflicts_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN conflicts_of_interest c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name HAVING conflicts_count > 0;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, r.start_date, r.relationship_type FROM employees e INNER JOIN relationships r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE r.end_date IS NULL ORDER BY r.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT business_name, industry, location FROM business_interests WHERE industry='Technology';
SELECT employee1_id, employee2_id, relation_type FROM relationships WHERE relation_type='Manager';
SELECT conflict_id, report_description, report_date FROM conflict_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT business_name, industry, location FROM business_interests WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT employee1_id, employee2_id, start_date, end_date FROM relationships WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT conflict_id, report_description, DATE_FORMAT(report_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_report_date FROM conflict_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
